title: Greg Miller Will Never Cheat on You - Gregway Epsiode 26
description:
What are the morals Greg Miller lives by? Wings, honesty, and beer.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Leave your questions for Greg in the comments and check back every Wednesday and Friday to see what he's saying.

Subscribe to Greg's channel: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Our Merch Store is live: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

The Vlog playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOlEpGVXWUVv1g9oZi6O95CwRHQd0ulT6

Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/user/GameOverGreggy

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody Welcome to a gregway every Wednesday and Friday I take one of your questions from the comments below and or a Twitter question and answer it here in this video form you like it hopefully and you like the video then you subscribe to the channel and you keep coming back for things like a conversation with Colin and whatever pillo the dog is up to right now he's up to Flying today's question comes from Kyle Kyle writes in and says Greg what kind of morals do you live by that you would never break [ __ ] Kyle that's a bit hardcore um what morals do I live by that I would never break I mean the the main thing here right is treat others the way you want to be treated that's the big deal to me you know I tried to I think I talk about this a little bit in the Superman episode you know that like I think about like trying to be the bigger person you know turn the other cheek kind of guy right like you want to talk [ __ ] to me on the internet you want to I mean I know you

you know that like I think about like trying to be the bigger person you know turn the other cheek kind of guy right like you want to talk [ __ ] to me on the internet you want to I mean I know you know I'm I'm super blessed and everything I get to do I get to do these YouTube videos I you work at a great website here at IGN I can see even when you're making me mad on the Internet or yelling at me and calling me names like whatever that doesn't matter I'll let that bounce off me I don't need to worry about that I don't need to come after you sometimes I take the trolls and show them the light of day just to show everybody like don't be like this guy don't be an idiot I mean but like morals I mean overall cheating I've never understood cheating on somebody well why how does this happen now granted I'm an overweight ugly guy so it's not like girls are just throwing themselves at me right like I'm in one relationship and all of a sudden it's just girl like it's not happening but I've

now granted I'm an overweight ugly guy so it's not like girls are just throwing themselves at me right like I'm in one relationship and all of a sudden it's just girl like it's not happening but I've never been able to wrap my my head around that aspect of it just like being so controlled by your hormones I guess that you're like oh man I got to [ __ ] somebody right now and it's you like I understand like you're in a bad relationship and maybe it's not going well and you're fighting and yet da D you don't feel like you're being treated right then break the [ __ ] up like what are you do what are you doing cheating on somebody and these people who have great people that they're they're with and they cheat on them start their crap it's like just man up or woman up break up it's that easy or if you're about to cheat on somebody right like is it that hard to be like phone call him text message him be like I don't know that's much better that's kind of an out I guess all over you just be

if you're about to cheat on somebody right like is it that hard to be like phone call him text message him be like I don't know that's much better that's kind of an out I guess all over you just be like hey I'm about to [ __ ] somebody I don't want to be with you anymore but I mean that's better than nothing right at least you can say then I haven't cheated you know I don't know I've never understood that but then again never cheated on anybody never been cheated on that I know of so that wraps up this Greg way I will be back every Wednesday and Friday to answer one of your questions so make sure I have something to Vlog about leave your question in the comments below then make sure you follow me on Twitter tweet at me there subscribe like this see what Colin's saying on conversation with Colin why don't you he says crazy things I heard on the internet until next time have a Gregs and bacon kind of day still don't have an outro
